title: Tool Development
longdescription: The overall goal for this project was to make a game designer's life much easier when it comes to building up a game. The focus of the tools should be making sure that it’s easier and faster to do some things using these tools than without. So, these tools need to be powerful and efficient to be easy to use. They need to be made so that a designer can get their hands on them and use them effectively without having to learn lots of rules and methodologies to be able to use them. There also needs to be careful consideration when it comes to usability, especially when it comes to the user interface. Because if it’s difficult to use a designer won’t want to use the tool and just go back to doing things manually. If I can make free tools that work well and are easy to use, then this will be a great success for the project.

title: Western Roundup
longdescription: 'Crazy Critters duel it out in minigame madness' 4 criminals, trying to aim high, hoping to rest from their criminal life, whoever gets the most amount of gold becomes the legend of Weston, take on various mini-games to earn valuable items, you either become the richest legend or be the low life that you're always are.

title: Simple Tower Defence
longdescription: A project I worked on during the second trimester of my Level 5. The task was to develop a 2D game and I have always loved Tower Defence games. So I set out to make a simple and straightforward tower defence game using inspiration from games such as Thronefall.
